title.en: Biographies of Pi, the Prince of Wu
title.raw: 《吳王濞列傳》 Biographies of Pi, the Prince of Wu

sentences.zh: 吳王濞者，高帝兄劉仲之子也。

translations.literal: Wu wang Bi person, Gao Di brother Liu Zhong zhi zi.
translations.idiomatic: King Wu Bi was the son of Liu Zhong, Emperor Gao's elder brother.

sentences.zh: 高帝已定天下七年，立劉仲為代王。

translations.literal: Gao Di yi ding tian xia seven years, li Liu Zhong wei Dai wang.
translations.idiomatic: Seven years after Emperor Gao pacified the realm, he enfeoffed Liu Zhong as King of Dai.

sentences.zh: 而匈奴攻代，劉仲不能堅守，棄國亡，閒行走雒陽，自歸天子。

translations.literal: Yet Xiongnu attack Dai, Liu Zhong not able jian shou, qi guo wang, xian xing zou Luo yang, self gui tian zi.
translations.idiomatic: But the Xiongnu attacked Dai, Liu Zhong could not hold firm, abandoned his kingdom and fled, secretly traveled to Luoyang, and surrendered to the emperor.

sentences.zh: 天子為骨肉故，不忍致法，廢以為郃陽侯。

translations.literal: Tian zi wei gu rou gu, not ren zhi fa, fei yi wei He yang hou.
translations.idiomatic: For the sake of flesh and blood relations, the emperor could not bear to execute him, demoted him to Marquis of Heyang.

sentences.zh: 高帝十一年秋，淮南王英布反，東并荊地，劫其國兵，西度淮，擊楚，高帝自將往誅之。

translations.literal: Gao Di eleven years autumn, Huai nan wang Ying Bu fan, dong bing Jing di, jie qi guo bing, xi du Huai, ji Chu, Gao Di self jiang wang zhu it.
translations.idiomatic: In autumn of Emperor Gao's eleventh year, King Ying Bu of Huainan rebelled, to the east annexed Jing territory, seized his state troops, crossed the Huai west, attacked Chu, Emperor Gao personally led troops to execute him.

sentences.zh: 劉仲子沛侯濞年二十，有氣力，以騎將從破布軍蘄西，會甀，布走。

translations.literal: Liu Zhong zi Pei hou Bi year twenty, have qi li, yi qi jiang cong po Bu jun Qi xi, hui Pi, Bu zou.
translations.idiomatic: Liu Zhong's son Marquis Bi of Pei was twenty years old, had strength, as cavalry general followed to defeat Bu's army at Qixi, met at Pi, Bu fled.

sentences.zh: 荊王劉賈為布所殺，無後。

translations.literal: Jing wang Liu Jia wei Bu suo sha, wu hou.
translations.idiomatic: King Liu Jia of Jing was killed by Bu, had no heir.

sentences.zh: 上患吳、會稽輕悍，無壯王以填之，諸子少，乃立濞於沛為吳王，王三郡五十三城。

translations.literal: Shang huan Wu, Hui ji qing han, wu zhuang wang yi tian it, zhu zi shao, then li Bi yu Pei wei Wu wang, wang three jun fifty three cheng.
translations.idiomatic: The emperor worried Wu and Huiji were fierce and tough, had no strong king to fill them, all sons were young, so enfeoffed Bi at Pei as King of Wu, ruling three commanderies and fifty-three cities.

sentences.zh: 已拜受印，高帝召濞相之，謂曰：「若狀有反相。」

translations.literal: Yi bai shou yin, Gao Di zhao Bi xiang it, wei yue: "Ru zhuang have fan xiang."
translations.idiomatic: After receiving the seal, Emperor Gao summoned Bi to look at him and said: "Your appearance has rebellious features."

sentences.zh: 心獨悔，業已拜，因拊其背，告曰：「漢後五十年東南有亂者，豈若邪？

translations.literal: Xin du hui, ye yi bai, yin fu qi bei, gao yue: "Han hou fifty years dong nan have luan person, qi ru xie?
translations.idiomatic: He regretted in his heart, but the appointment was already made, so he patted his back and warned: "Fifty years after Han, if there is chaos in the southeast, would it be you?

sentences.zh: 然天下同姓為一家也，慎無反！」

translations.literal: Ran tian xia tong xing wei yi jia, shen wu fan!"
translations.idiomatic: But the realm's same surname is one family, be careful not to rebel!"

sentences.zh: 濞頓首曰：「不敢。」

translations.literal: Bi dun shou yue: "Bu gan."
translations.idiomatic: Bi kowtowed and said: "I dare not."

sentences.zh: 會孝惠、高后時，天下初定，郡國諸侯各務自拊循其民。

translations.literal: Hui Xiao Hui, Gao Hou shi, tian xia chu ding, jun guo zhu hou ge wu zi fu xun qi min.
translations.idiomatic: During Emperor Hui and Empress Gao periods, the realm was newly pacified, commandery and kingdom feudal lords each diligently comforted and governed their people.

sentences.zh: 吳有豫章郡銅山，濞則招致天下亡命者（益）［盜］鑄錢，煮海水為鹽，以故無賦，國用富饒。

translations.literal: Wu have Yu zhang jun tong shan, Bi then zhao zhi tian xia wang ming person (yi) [dao] zhu qian, zhu hai shui wei yan, yi gu wu fu, guo yong fu rao.
translations.idiomatic: Wu had the copper mountain of Yuzhang commandery, Bi then summoned the realm's fugitives to cast coins, boiled seawater for salt, therefore no taxes, state wealth abundant.

sentences.zh: 孝文時，吳太子入見，得侍皇太子飲博。

translations.literal: Xiao Wen shi, Wu tai zi ru jian, de shi Huang tai zi yin bo.
translations.idiomatic: During Emperor Wen's time, the Wu crown prince entered to see the emperor, got to serve drinking and gaming with the imperial crown prince.

sentences.zh: 吳太子師傅皆楚人，輕悍，又素驕，博，爭道，不恭，皇太子引博局提吳太子，殺之。

translations.literal: Wu tai zi shi fu jie Chu ren, qing han, you su jiao, bo, zheng dao, not gong, Huang tai zi yin bo ju ti Wu tai zi, sha it.
translations.idiomatic: The Wu crown prince's tutors were all Chu people, fierce and tough, moreover habitually arrogant, gaming, disputed the way, not respectful, the imperial crown prince pulled the gaming board and beat the Wu crown prince to death.

sentences.zh: 於是遣其喪歸葬。

translations.literal: Yu shi qian qi sang gui zang.
translations.idiomatic: Thereupon he sent his coffin back for burial.

sentences.zh: 至吳，吳王慍曰：「天下同宗，死長安即葬長安，何必來葬為！」

translations.literal: Zhi Wu, Wu wang yun yue: "Tian xia tong zong, si Chang an ji zang Chang an, he bi lai zang wei!"
translations.idiomatic: Arriving at Wu, the King of Wu angrily said: "The realm is same clan, if died in Chang'an then bury in Chang'an, why necessarily come bury!"

sentences.zh: 復遣喪之長安葬。

translations.literal: Fu qian sang zhi Chang an zang.
translations.idiomatic: Again sent the coffin to Chang'an for burial.

sentences.zh: 吳王由此稍失藩臣之禮，稱病不朝。

translations.literal: Wu wang you ci shao shi fan chen zhi li, cheng bing not chao.
translations.idiomatic: The King of Wu from this gradually lost vassal minister's etiquette, claimed illness and did not attend court.

sentences.zh: 京師知其以子故稱病不朝，驗問實不病，諸吳使來，輒系責治之。

translations.literal: Jing shi zhi qi yi zi gu cheng bing not chao, yan wen shi not bing, zhu Wu shi lai, zhe xi ze zhi it.
translations.idiomatic: The capital knew he claimed illness because of his son and did not attend court, verified and asked truly not ill, all Wu envoys who came were arrested and punished.

sentences.zh: 吳王恐，為謀滋甚。

translations.literal: Wu wang kong, wei mou zi shen.
translations.idiomatic: The King of Wu feared, his plotting increasingly severe.

sentences.zh: 及後使人為秋請，上復責問吳使者，使者對曰：「王實不病，漢系治使者數輩，以故遂稱病。

translations.literal: Ji hou shi ren wei qiu qing, shang fu ze wen Wu shi zhe, shi zhe dui yue: "Wang shi not bing, Han xi zhi shi zhe shu bei, yi gu sui cheng bing.
translations.idiomatic: When later sent people to request autumn audience, the emperor again questioned the Wu envoys, the envoys replied: "The king truly not ill, Han arrests and punishes envoys several times, therefore finally claimed illness.

sentences.zh: 且夫『察見淵中魚，不祥』。

translations.literal: Qie fu "cha jian yuan zhong yu, not xiang".
translations.idiomatic: Moreover 'inspecting and seeing fish in the abyss is inauspicious.'

sentences.zh: 今王始詐病，及覺，見責急，愈益閉，恐上誅之，計乃無聊。

translations.literal: Jin wang shi zha bing, ji jue, jian ze ji, yu yi bi, kong shang zhu it, ji nai wu liao.
translations.idiomatic: Now the king first feigned illness, when discovered, saw the questioning urgent, increasingly withdrew, feared the emperor would execute him, plans then helpless.

sentences.zh: 唯上棄之而與更始。」

translations.literal: Wei shang qi it yet yu geng shi."
translations.idiomatic: Only if your majesty abandons him and lets him start anew."

sentences.zh: 於是天子乃赦吳使者歸之，而賜吳王几杖，老，不朝。

translations.literal: Yu shi tian zi nai she Wu shi zhe gui it, yet ci Wu wang ji zhang, lao, not chao.
translations.idiomatic: Thereupon the emperor pardoned the Wu envoys and returned them, moreover granted the King of Wu staff and mat, old, not attend court.

sentences.zh: 吳得釋其罪，謀亦益解。

translations.literal: Wu de shi qi zui, mou yi jie.
translations.idiomatic: Wu got released from his crime, plotting also increasingly relaxed.

sentences.zh: 然其居國以銅鹽故，百姓無賦。

translations.literal: Ran qi ju guo yi tong yan gu, bai xing wu fu.
translations.idiomatic: But residing in the kingdom with copper salt reasons, the people had no taxes.

sentences.zh: 卒踐更，輒與平賈。

translations.literal: Zu jian geng, zhe yu ping jia.
translations.idiomatic: When completing the military service, always gave fair value.

sentences.zh: 歲時存問茂材，賞賜閭里。

translations.literal: Sui shi cun wen mao cai, shang ci lu li.
translations.idiomatic: Seasonally visited and asked about worthy talents, rewarded and granted neighborhoods.

sentences.zh: 佗郡國吏欲來捕亡人者，訟共禁弗予。

translations.literal: Tuo jun guo li yu lai bu wang ren zhe, song gong jin fu yu.
translations.idiomatic: Other commandery kingdom officials who wanted to come capture fugitives, he petitioned together to forbid and not give them.

sentences.zh: 如此者四十餘年，以故能使其眾。

translations.literal: Ru ci zhe forty yu nian, yi gu neng shi qi zhong.
translations.idiomatic: Like this for over forty years, therefore able to command his multitude.

sentences.zh: 晁錯為太子家令，得幸太子，數從容言吳過可削。

translations.literal: Chao Cuo wei tai zi jia ling, de xing tai zi, shu cong rong yan Wu guo ke xue.
translations.idiomatic: Chao Cuo served as crown prince's household steward, got favored by the crown prince, repeatedly leisurely spoke that Wu's faults could be reduced.

sentences.zh: 數上書說孝文帝，文帝寬，不忍罰，以此吳日益橫。

translations.literal: Shu shang shu shuo Xiao Wen Di, Wen Di kuan, not ren fa, yi ci Wu yi ri heng.
translations.idiomatic: Repeatedly memorialized to persuade Emperor Wen, Emperor Wen lenient, not willing to punish, therefore Wu increasingly arrogant.

sentences.zh: 及孝景帝即位，錯為御史大夫，說上曰：「昔高帝初定天下，昆弟少，諸子弱，大封同姓，故王孽子悼惠王王齊七十餘城，庶弟元王王楚四十餘城，兄子濞王吳五十餘城：封三庶孽，分天下半。

translations.literal: Ji Xiao Jing Di ji wei, Cuo wei yu shi da fu, shuo shang yue: "Xi Gao Di chu ding tian xia, kun di shao, zhu zi ruo, da feng tong xing, gu wang nie zi Dao Hui wang wang Qi seventy yu cheng, shu di Yuan wang wang Chu forty yu cheng, xiong zi Bi wang Wu fifty yu cheng: feng three shu nie, fen tian xia ban.
translations.idiomatic: When Emperor Jing ascended, Cuo became imperial censor, spoke to the emperor: "Formerly Emperor Gao initially pacified the realm, brothers few, sons weak, greatly enfeoffed same surname, therefore enfeoffed bastard son Dao Hui Wang to rule Qi over seventy cities, younger brother Yuan Wang to rule Chu over forty cities, brother's son Bi to rule Wu over fifty cities: enfeoffed three bastard sons, divided half the realm.

sentences.zh: 今吳王前有太子之郄，詐稱病不朝，於古法當誅，文帝弗忍，因賜几杖。

translations.literal: Jin Wu wang qian you tai zi xi, zha cheng bing not chao, yu gu fa dang zhu, Wen Di fu ren, yin ci Wu wang ji zhang.
translations.idiomatic: Now the King of Wu previously had crown prince enmity, feigned illness and did not attend court, by ancient law should be executed, Emperor Wen could not bear it, therefore granted staff and mat.

sentences.zh: 德至厚，當改過自新。

translations.literal: De zhi hou, dang gai guo zi xin.
translations.idiomatic: Virtue extremely thick, should have reformed and started anew.

sentences.zh: 乃益驕溢，即山鑄錢，煮海水為鹽，誘天下亡人，謀作亂。

translations.literal: Nai yi jiao yi, ji shan zhu qian, zhu hai shui wei yan, you tian xia wang ren, mou zuo luan.
translations.idiomatic: But increasingly arrogant, then mountain cast coins, boiled seawater for salt, lured realm fugitives, plotted to rebel.

sentences.zh: 今削之亦反，不削之亦反。

translations.literal: Jin xue it yi fan, not xue it yi fan.
translations.idiomatic: Now reduce it also rebel, not reduce it also rebel.

sentences.zh: 削之，其反亟，禍小；

translations.literal: Xue it, qi fan ji, huo xiao;
translations.idiomatic: Reduce it, its rebellion quick, calamity small;

sentences.zh: 不削，反遲，禍大。」

translations.literal: Not xue, fan chi, huo da."
translations.idiomatic: Not reduce, rebellion slow, calamity great."

sentences.zh: 三年冬，楚王朝，晁錯因言楚王戊往年為薄太后服，私姦服舍，請誅之。

translations.literal: Three years winter, Chu wang chao, Cuo yin yan Chu wang Wu wang nian wei Bo tai hou fu, si jian fu she, qing zhu it.
translations.idiomatic: Third year winter, Chu king attended court, Cuo therefore spoke that Chu king Wu previous year for Empress Bo mourned, privately illicit in mourning residence, requested to execute him.

sentences.zh: 詔赦，罰削東海郡。

translations.literal: Zhao she, fa xue Dong hai jun.
translations.idiomatic: Imperial decree pardoned, punished by reducing Donghai commandery.

sentences.zh: 因削吳之豫章郡、會稽郡。

translations.literal: Yin xue Wu zhi Yu zhang jun, Hui ji jun.
translations.idiomatic: Therefore reduced Wu's Yuzhang commandery, Huiji commandery.

sentences.zh: 及前二年趙王有罪，削其河閒郡。

translations.literal: Ji qian two years Zhao wang have zui, xue qi He jian jun.
translations.idiomatic: And previous two years Zhao king had crime, reduced his Hejian commandery.

sentences.zh: 膠西王卬以賣爵有姦，削其六縣。

translations.literal: Jiao xi wang Ang yi mai jue have jian, xue qi six xian.
translations.idiomatic: Jiaoxi king Ang because selling ranks had corruption, reduced his six counties.

sentences.zh: 漢廷臣方議削吳。

translations.literal: Han ting chen fang yi xue Wu.
translations.idiomatic: Han court ministers just discussing reducing Wu.

sentences.zh: 吳王濞恐削地無已，因以此發謀，欲舉事。

translations.literal: Wu wang Bi kong xue di wu yi, yin yi ci fa mou, yu ju shi.
translations.idiomatic: King Wu Bi feared reducing territory endless, because of this aroused plotting, wanted to raise affairs.

sentences.zh: 念諸侯無足與計謀者，聞膠西王勇，好氣，喜兵，諸齊皆憚畏，於是乃使中大夫應高誂膠西王。

translations.literal: Nian zhu hou wu zu yu ji mou zhe, wen Jiao xi wang yong, hao qi, xi bing, zhu Qi jie dan wei, yu shi nai shi zhong da fu Ying Gao tao Jiao xi wang.
translations.idiomatic: Considered feudal lords none sufficient to plot with, heard Jiaoxi king brave, liked valor, loved soldiers, all Qi feared him, thereupon sent court gentleman Ying Gao to tempt Jiaoxi king.

sentences.zh: 無文書，口報曰：「吳王不肖，有宿夕之憂，不敢自外，使喻其驩心。」

translations.literal: Wu wen shu, kou bao yue: "Wu wang not xiao, have su xi zhi you, not gan zi wai, shi yu qi huan xin."
translations.idiomatic: No written document, orally reported: "The King of Wu unworthy, has day and night worries, dares not exclude himself, sent to explain his joyful heart."

sentences.zh: 王曰：「何以教之？」

translations.literal: Wang yue: "He yi jiao it?"
translations.idiomatic: The king said: "How to instruct him?"

sentences.zh: 高曰：「今者主上興於姦，飾於邪臣，好小善，聽讒賊，擅變更律令，侵奪諸侯之地，徵求滋多，誅罰良善，日以益甚。

translations.literal: Gao yue: "Jin zhe zhu shang xing yu jian, shi yu xie chen, hao xiao shan, ting chan zei, shan bian geng lv ling, qin duo zhu hou zhi di, zheng qiu zi duo, zhu fa liang shan, ri yi yi shen.
translations.idiomatic: Gao said: "Now the ruler arises from villainy, adorned by evil ministers, likes petty goodness, listens to slanderers and traitors, arbitrarily changes laws and commands, invades and seizes feudal lords' lands, demands increasingly many, executes and punishes the good and worthy, daily increasingly severe.

sentences.zh: 里語有之，『舐糠及米』。

translations.literal: Li yu you it, "shi kang ji mi".
translations.idiomatic: Neighborhood saying has it, 'licking bran reaches rice.'

sentences.zh: 吳與膠西，知名諸侯也，一時見察，恐不得安肆矣。

translations.literal: Wu yu Jiao xi, zhi ming zhu hou, yi shi jian cha, kong bu de an si.
translations.idiomatic: Wu and Jiaoxi are famous feudal lords, at once seen investigated, fear cannot peacefully indulge.

sentences.zh: 吳王身有內病，不能朝請二十餘年，嘗患見疑，無以自白，今脅肩累足，猶懼不見釋。

translations.literal: Wu wang shen you nei bing, not neng chao qing twenty yu nian, chang huan jian yi, wu yi zi bai, jin xie jian lei zu, you ju bu jian shi.
translations.idiomatic: The King of Wu personally has internal illness, cannot attend court audience over twenty years, often troubled by suspicion, no way to clear himself, now shrugs shoulders piles feet, still fears not seen released.

sentences.zh: 竊聞大王以爵事有適，所聞諸侯削地，罪不至此，此恐不得削地而已。」

translations.literal: Qie wen da wang yi jue shi have shi, suo wen zhu hou xue di, zui not zhi ci, ci kong bu de xue di er yi."
translations.idiomatic: Secretly heard your majesty because of rank affairs had error, heard feudal lords reduced lands, crime not reach this, this fears not only reducing land."

sentences.zh: 王曰：「然，有之。

translations.literal: Wang yue: "Ran, have it.
translations.idiomatic: The king said: "Yes, there is that.

sentences.zh: 子將柰何？」

translations.literal: Zi jiang nai he?"
translations.idiomatic: You will do what?"

sentences.zh: 高曰：「同惡相助，同好相留，同情相成，同欲相趨，同利相死。

translations.literal: Gao yue: "Tong e xiang zhu, tong hao xiang liu, tong qing xiang cheng, tong yu xiang qu, tong li xiang si.
translations.idiomatic: Gao said: "Same evil mutually assist, same good mutually detain, same emotion mutually accomplish, same desire mutually hasten, same benefit mutually die.

sentences.zh: 今吳王自以為與大王同憂，願因時循理，棄軀以除患害於天下，億亦可乎？」

translations.literal: Jin Wu wang zi yi wei yu da wang tong you, yuan yin shi xun li, qi qu yi chu huan hai yu tian xia, yi yi ke hu?"
translations.idiomatic: Now the King of Wu himself considers with your majesty same worry, wishes following time complying with principle, abandoning body to eliminate calamity harm for the realm, perhaps also possible?"

sentences.zh: 王瞿然駭曰：「寡人何敢如是？

translations.literal: Wang ju ran hai yue: "Gua ren he gan ru shi?
translations.idiomatic: The king startled and alarmed said: "I dare be like this?

sentences.zh: 今主上雖急，固有死耳，安得不戴？」

translations.literal: Jin zhu shang sui ji, gu you si er, an bu de dai?"
translations.idiomatic: Now the ruler though urgent, firmly have death, how not wear crown?"

sentences.zh: 高曰：「御史大夫晁錯，熒惑天子，侵奪諸侯，蔽忠塞賢，朝廷疾怨，諸侯皆有倍畔之意，人事極矣。

translations.literal: Gao yue: "Yu shi da fu Cuo, ying huo tian zi, qin duo zhu hou, bi zhong sai xian, chao ting ji yuan, zhu hou jie have bei pan zhi yi, ren shi ji.
translations.idiomatic: Gao said: "Imperial censor Chao Cuo, bewilders the emperor, invades feudal lords, blocks loyal secludes worthy, court hates resents, feudal lords all have rebellion intention, human affairs extreme.

sentences.zh: 彗星出，蝗蟲數起，此萬世一時，而愁勞聖人之所以起也。

translations.literal: Hui xing chu, huang chong shu qi, ci wan shi yi shi, er you lao sheng ren suo yi qi.
translations.idiomatic: Comet appears, locusts repeatedly arise, this ten thousand generations one time, moreover sorrow labors sage person arises reason.

sentences.zh: 故吳王欲內以晁錯為討，外隨大王後車，彷徉天下，所鄉者降，所指者下，天下莫敢不服。

translations.literal: Gu Wu wang yu nei yi Cuo wei tao, wai sui da wang hou che, pang yang tian xia, suo xiang zhe xiang, suo zhi zhe xia, tian xia mo gan bu fu.
translations.idiomatic: Therefore the King of Wu wants internally with Cuo as target, externally follows your majesty's rear chariot, wandering the realm, where faces descend, where points submit, realm none dare not serve.

sentences.zh: 大王誠幸而許之一言，則吳王率楚王略函谷關，守滎陽敖倉之粟，距漢兵。

translations.literal: Da wang cheng xing er xu it yi yan, then Wu wang shuai Chu wang lue Han gu guan, shou Xing yang Ao cang zhi su, ju Han bing.
translations.idiomatic: If your majesty truly fortunate and permits one word, then the King of Wu will lead Chu king attack Hangu pass, guard Xingyang Aocang grain, resist Han troops.

sentences.zh: 治次舍，須大王。

translations.literal: Zhi ci she, xu da wang.
translations.idiomatic: Arrange secondary quarters, await your majesty.

sentences.zh: 大王有幸而臨之，則天下可并，兩主分割，不亦可乎？」

translations.literal: Da wang have xing er lin it, then tian xia ke bing, liang zhu fen ge, not yi ke hu?"
translations.idiomatic: Your majesty has fortune and arrives there, then realm can unify, two rulers divide territory, not also possible?"

sentences.zh: 王曰：「善。」

translations.literal: Wang yue: "Shan."
translations.idiomatic: The king said: "Good."

sentences.zh: 高歸報吳王，吳王猶恐其不與，乃身自為使，使於膠西，面結之。

translations.literal: Gao gui bao Wu wang, Wu wang you kong qi not yu, nai shen zi wei shi, shi yu Jiao xi, mian jie it.
translations.idiomatic: Gao returned reported to King Wu, King Wu still feared he not participate, then personally as envoy, went to Jiaoxi, face bound him.

sentences.zh: 膠西群臣或聞王謀，諫曰：「承一帝，至樂也。

translations.literal: Jiao xi qun chen or wen wang mou, jian yue: "Cheng yi Di, zhi le.
translations.idiomatic: Jiaoxi ministers some heard king's plot, advised: "Supporting one emperor, extremely happy.

sentences.zh: 今大王與吳西鄉，弟令事成，兩主分爭，患乃始結。

translations.literal: Jin da wang yu Wu xi xiang, di ling shi cheng, liang zhu fen zheng, huan nai shi jie.
translations.idiomatic: Now your majesty with Wu west face, younger brother commands affairs succeed, two rulers divide contend, calamity then begins knot.

sentences.zh: 諸侯之地不足為漢郡什二，而為畔逆以憂太后，非長策也。」

translations.literal: Zhu hou zhi di bu zu wei Han jun shi er, yet wei pan ni yi you tai hou, not chang ce."
translations.idiomatic: Feudal lords' lands not sufficient as Han commanderies ten two, yet for rebellion to worry empress dowager, not long strategy."

sentences.zh: 王弗聽。

translations.literal: Wang fu ting.
translations.idiomatic: The king not listened.

sentences.zh: 遂發使約齊、菑川、膠東、濟南、濟北，皆許諾，而曰「城陽景王有義，攻諸呂，勿與，事定分之耳」。

translations.literal: Sui fa shi yue Qi, Zi chuan, Jiao dong, Ji nan, Ji bei, jie xu nuo, yet yue "Cheng yang Jing wang have yi, gong Zhu Lv, wu yu, shi ding fen it er".
translations.idiomatic: Thereupon sent envoys allied Qi, Zichuan, Jiaodong, Jinan, Jibei, all promised agreement, moreover said "Chengyang Jing Wang has righteousness, attacked various Lü, do not participate, affairs settled divide it".

sentences.zh: 諸侯既新削罰，振恐，多怨晁錯。

translations.literal: Zhu hou ji xin xue fa, zhen kong, duo yuan Cuo.
translations.idiomatic: Feudal lords already newly reduced punished, aroused fear, much resented Cuo.

sentences.zh: 及削吳會稽、豫章郡書至，則吳王先起兵，膠西正月丙午誅漢吏二千石以下，膠東、菑川、濟南、楚、趙亦然，遂發兵西。

translations.literal: Ji xue Wu Hui ji, Yu zhang jun shu zhi, then Wu wang xian qi bing, Jiao xi zheng yue Bing wu zhu Han li two thousand stone xia, Jiao dong, Zi chuan, Ji nan, Chu, Zhao yi ran, sui fa bing xi.
translations.idiomatic: When reduced Wu Huiji, Yuzhang commandery document arrived, then King Wu first raised troops, Jiaoxi first month Bingwu executed Han officials two thousand stone and below, Jiaodong, Zichuan, Jinan, Chu, Zhao also so, thereupon sent troops west.

sentences.zh: 齊王後悔，飲藥自殺，畔約。

translations.literal: Qi wang hou hui, yin yao zi sha, pan yue.
translations.idiomatic: Qi king later regretted, drank medicine suicide, broke alliance.

sentences.zh: 濟北王城壞未完，其郎中令劫守其王，不得發兵。

translations.literal: Ji bei wang cheng huai not wan, qi lang zhong ling jie shou qi wang, not de fa bing.
translations.idiomatic: Jibei king city walls broken not complete, his attendant colonel forced guarded his king, could not send troops.

sentences.zh: 膠西為渠率，膠東、菑川、濟南共攻圍臨菑。

translations.literal: Jiao xi wei qu shuai, Jiao dong, Zi chuan, Ji nan gong gong wei Lin Zi.
translations.idiomatic: Jiaoxi as canal leader, Jiaodong, Zichuan, Jinan together attacked surrounded Linzi.

sentences.zh: 趙王遂亦反，陰使匈奴與連兵。

translations.literal: Zhao wang sui yi fan, yin shi Xiong nu yu lian bing.
translations.idiomatic: Zhao king thereupon also rebelled, secretly sent Xiongnu connected troops.

sentences.zh: 七國之發也，吳王悉其士卒，下令國中曰：「寡人年六十二，身自將。

translations.literal: Qi guo zhi fa, Wu wang xi qi shi zu, xia ling guo zhong yue: "Gua ren nian sixty two, shen zi jiang.
translations.idiomatic: Seven kingdoms' uprising, King Wu assembled all his soldiers, issued order in kingdom: "I aged sixty-two, personally lead.

sentences.zh: 少子年十四，亦為士卒先。

translations.literal: Shao zi nian fourteen, yi wei shi zu xian.
translations.idiomatic: Youngest son aged fourteen, also as soldier vanguard.

sentences.zh: 諸年上與寡人比，下與少子等者，皆發。」

translations.literal: Zhu nian shang yu gua ren bi, xia yu shao zi deng zhe, jie fa."
translations.idiomatic: All ages above equal to me, below equal to youngest son, all mobilize."

sentences.zh: 發二十餘萬人。

translations.literal: Fa twenty yu wan ren.
translations.idiomatic: Mobilized over twenty thousand people.

sentences.zh: 南使閩越、東越，東越亦發兵從。

translations.literal: Nan shi Min Yue, Dong Yue, Dong Yue yi fa bing cong.
translations.idiomatic: South sent Minyue, Dongyue, Dongyue also sent troops followed.

sentences.zh: 孝景帝三年正月甲子，初起兵於廣陵。

translations.literal: Xiao Jing Di three years zheng yue Jia zi, chu qi bing yu Guang ling.
translations.idiomatic: Emperor Jing third year first month Jiazi, initially raised troops at Guangling.

sentences.zh: 西涉淮，因并楚兵。

translations.literal: Xi she Huai, yin bing Chu bing.
translations.idiomatic: West crossed Huai, thereby united Chu troops.

sentences.zh: 發使遺諸侯書曰：「吳王劉濞敬問膠西王、膠東王、菑川王、濟南王、趙王、楚王、淮南王、衡山王、廬江王、故長沙王子：幸教寡人！

translations.literal: Fa shi yi zhu hou shu yue: "Wu wang Liu Bi jing wen Jiao xi wang, Jiao dong wang, Zi chuan wang, Ji nan wang, Zhao wang, Chu wang, Huai nan wang, Heng shan wang, Lu jiang wang, gu Chang sha wang zi: xing jiao gua ren!
translations.idiomatic: Sent envoys presented feudal lords letter: "King Wu Liu Bi respectfully asks Jiaoxi king, Jiaodong king, Zichuan king, Jinan king, Zhao king, Chu king, Huainan king, Hengshan king, Lujiang king, former Changsha king son: fortunate instruct me!

sentences.zh: 以漢有賊臣，無功天下，侵奪諸侯地，使吏劾系訊治，以僇辱之為故，不以諸侯人君禮遇劉氏骨肉，絕先帝功臣，進任姦宄，詿亂天下，欲危社稷。

translations.literal: Yi Han have zei chen, wu gong tian xia, qin duo zhu hou di, shi li he xi xun zhi, yi lu ru it wei gu, not yi zhu hou ren jun li yu Liu shi gu rou, jue xian Di gong chen, jin ren jian gou, gui luan tian xia, yu wei she ji.
translations.idiomatic: Because Han has traitor ministers, no merit realm, invade seize feudal lords lands, make officials impeach arrest interrogate punish, with humiliation as reason, not with feudal lord ruler etiquette treat Liu clan flesh blood, cut off former emperor meritorious ministers, advance employ villains, deceive disorder realm, want endanger altars of soil and grain.

sentences.zh: 陛下多病志失，不能省察。

translations.literal: Bi xia duo bing zhi shi, not neng sheng cha.
translations.idiomatic: His majesty much ill will lost, cannot examine investigate.

sentences.zh: 欲舉兵誅之，謹聞教。

translations.literal: Yu ju bing zhu it, jin wen jiao.
translations.idiomatic: Want raise troops execute him, respectfully hear instruction.

sentences.zh: 敝國雖狹，地方三千里；

translations.literal: Bi guo sui xia, di fang three thousand li;
translations.idiomatic: My kingdom though narrow, territory three thousand li;

sentences.zh: 人雖少，精兵可具五十萬。

translations.literal: Ren sui shao, jing bing ke ju fifty wan.
translations.idiomatic: People though few, elite troops can prepare fifty thousand.

sentences.zh: 寡人素事南越三十餘年，其王君皆不辭分其卒以隨寡人，又可得三十餘萬。

translations.literal: Gua ren su shi Nan Yue thirty yu nian, qi wang jun jie not ci fen qi zu yi sui gua ren, you ke de thirty yu wan.
translations.idiomatic: I usually served Nanyue over thirty years, their king lords all not refuse divide their troops to follow me, moreover can obtain over thirty thousand.

sentences.zh: 寡人雖不肖，願以身從諸王。

translations.literal: Gua ren sui not xiao, yuan yi shen cong zhu wang.
translations.idiomatic: I though unworthy, wish with body follow various kings.

sentences.zh: 越直長沙者，因王子定長沙以北，西走蜀、漢中。

translations.literal: Yue zhi Chang sha zhe, yin wang zi ding Chang sha yi bei, xi zou Shu, Han zhong.
translations.idiomatic: Yue go Changsha, because wang zi pacify Changsha north, west walk Shu, Hanzhong.

sentences.zh: 告越、楚王、淮南三王，與寡人西面；

translations.literal: Gao Yue, Chu wang, Huai nan three wang, yu gua ren xi mian;
translations.idiomatic: Tell Yue, Chu king, Huainan three kings, with me west face;

sentences.zh: 齊諸王與趙王定河閒、河內，或入臨晉關，或與寡人會雒陽；

translations.literal: Qi zhu wang yu Zhao wang ding He jian, He nei, or ru Lin Jin guan, or yu gua ren hui Luo yang;
translations.idiomatic: Qi various kings with Zhao king pacify Hejian, Henei, or enter Linjin pass, or with me meet Luoyang;

sentences.zh: 燕王、趙王固與胡王有約，燕王北定代、雲中，摶胡眾入蕭關，走長安，匡正天子，以安高廟。

translations.literal: Yan wang, Zhao wang gu yu Hu wang have yue, Yan wang bei ding Dai, Yun zhong, tuan Hu zhong ru Xiao guan, zou Chang an, kuang zheng tian zi, yi an gao miao.
translations.idiomatic: Yan king, Zhao king firmly with barbarian king have alliance, Yan king north pacify Dai, Yunzhong, gather barbarian multitudes enter Xiaoguan, walk Chang'an, rectify emperor, to pacify Gao temple.

sentences.zh: 願王勉之。

translations.literal: Yuan wang mian it.
translations.idiomatic: Wish kings strive it.

sentences.zh: 楚元王子、淮南三王或不沐洗十餘年，怨入骨髓，欲一有所出之久矣，寡人未得諸王之意，未敢聽。

translations.literal: Chu Yuan wang zi, Huai nan three wang or not mu xi ten yu nian, yuan ru gu sui, yu yi you suo chu it jiu, gua ren wei de zhu wang zhi yi, wei gan ting.
translations.idiomatic: Chu Yuan king son, Huainan three kings some not bathe wash over ten years, resentment enter bone marrow, want one have place issue it long, I not obtain various kings intention, not dare listen.

sentences.zh: 今諸王茍能存亡繼絕，振弱伐暴，以安劉氏，社稷之所願也。

translations.literal: Jin zhu wang gou neng cun wang ji jue, zhen ruo fa bao, yi an Liu shi, she ji zhi suo yuan.
translations.idiomatic: Now various kings if can preserve perished continue extinguished, strengthen weak attack violent, to pacify Liu clan, altars soil grain wish.

sentences.zh: 敝國雖貧，寡人節衣食之用，積金錢，彊兵革，聚穀食，夜以繼日，三十餘年矣。

translations.literal: Bi guo sui pin, gua ren jie yi shi zhi yong, ji jin qian, qiang bing ge, ju gu shi, ye yi ji ri, thirty yu nian.
translations.idiomatic: My kingdom though poor, I economize clothing food use, accumulate gold money, strengthen armor weapons, gather grain food, night continuing day, over thirty years.

sentences.zh: 凡為此，願諸王勉用之。

translations.literal: Fan wei ci, yuan zhu wang mian yong it.
translations.idiomatic: All for this, wish various kings strive use it.

sentences.zh: 能斬捕大將者，賜金五千斤，封萬戶；

translations.literal: Neng zhan bu da jiang zhe, ci jin five thousand jin, feng wan hu;
translations.idiomatic: Able behead capture great general, reward gold five thousand jin, enfeoff ten thousand households;

sentences.zh: 列將，三千斤，封五千戶；

translations.literal: Lie jiang, three thousand jin, feng five thousand hu;
translations.idiomatic: Deputy generals, three thousand jin, enfeoff five thousand households;

sentences.zh: 裨將，二千斤，封二千戶；

translations.literal: Pi jiang, two thousand jin, feng two thousand hu;
translations.idiomatic: Assistant generals, two thousand jin, enfeoff two thousand households;

sentences.zh: 二千石，千斤，封千戶；

translations.literal: Two thousand stone, thousand jin, feng thousand hu;
translations.idiomatic: Two thousand stone, thousand jin, enfeoff thousand households;

sentences.zh: 千石，五百斤，封五百戶：皆為列侯。

translations.literal: Thousand stone, five hundred jin, feng five hundred hu: jie wei lie hou.
translations.idiomatic: Thousand stone, five hundred jin, enfeoff five hundred households: all become marquises.

sentences.zh: 其以軍若城邑降者，卒萬人，邑萬戶，如得大將；

translations.literal: Qi yi jun ruo cheng yi xiang zhe, zu wan ren, yi wan hu, ru de da jiang;
translations.idiomatic: Those with army or city town surrender, soldiers ten thousand people, city ten thousand households, like obtaining great general;

sentences.zh: 人戶五千，如得列將；

translations.literal: Ren hu five thousand, ru de lie jiang;
translations.idiomatic: People households five thousand, like obtaining deputy general;

sentences.zh: 人戶三千，如得裨將；

translations.literal: Ren hu three thousand, ru de pi jiang;
translations.idiomatic: People households three thousand, like obtaining assistant general;

sentences.zh: 人戶千，如得二千石；

translations.literal: Ren hu thousand, ru de two thousand stone;
translations.idiomatic: People households thousand, like obtaining two thousand stone;

sentences.zh: 其小吏皆以差次受爵金。

translations.literal: Qi xiao li jie yi cha ci shou jue jin.
translations.idiomatic: Their small officials all by rank order receive nobility gold.

sentences.zh: 佗封賜皆倍軍法。

translations.literal: Tuo feng ci jie bei jun fa.
translations.idiomatic: Other enfeoffments rewards all double military law.

sentences.zh: 其有故爵邑者，更益勿因。

translations.literal: Qi you gu jue yi zhe, geng yi wu yin.
translations.idiomatic: Those having previous nobility fiefs, moreover increase not follow.

sentences.zh: 願諸王明以令士大夫，弗敢欺也。

translations.literal: Yuan zhu wang ming yi ling shi da fu, fu gan qi.
translations.idiomatic: Wish various kings clearly with command scholar officials, not dare deceive.

sentences.zh: 寡人金錢在天下者往往而有，非必取於吳，諸王日夜用之弗能盡。

translations.literal: Gua ren jin qian zai tian xia zhe wang wang er you, not bi qu yu Wu, zhu wang ri ye yong it fu neng jin.
translations.idiomatic: My gold money in realm scattered have, not necessarily take from Wu, various kings day night use it cannot exhaust.

sentences.zh: 有當賜者告寡人，寡人且往遺之。

translations.literal: You dang ci zhe gao gua ren, gua ren qie wang yi it.
translations.idiomatic: Have should reward tell me, I moreover will go send it.

sentences.zh: 敬以聞。」

translations.literal: Jing yi wen."
translations.idiomatic: Respectfully hear."

sentences.zh: 七國反書聞天子，天子乃遣太尉條侯周亞夫將三十六將軍，往擊吳楚；

translations.literal: Qi guo fan shu wen tian zi, tian zi nai qian tai wei tiao hou Zhou Ya fu jiang thirty six jiang jun, wang ji Wu Chu;
translations.idiomatic: Seven kingdoms rebellion letter heard emperor, emperor then sent commander Tiaohou Zhou Yafu lead thirty-six generals, go attack Wu Chu;

sentences.zh: 遣曲周侯酈寄擊趙；

translations.literal: Qian qu Zhou hou Li Ji ji Zhao;
translations.idiomatic: Sent Quzhou marquis Li Ji attack Zhao;

sentences.zh: 將軍欒布擊齊；

translations.literal: Jiang jun Luan Bu ji Qi;
translations.idiomatic: General Luan Bu attack Qi;

sentences.zh: 大將軍竇嬰屯滎陽，監齊趙兵。

translations.literal: Da jiang jun Dou Ying tun Xing yang, jian Qi Zhao bing.
translations.idiomatic: Grand general Dou Ying garrison Xingyang, oversee Qi Zhao troops.

sentences.zh: 吳楚反書聞，兵未發，竇嬰未行，言故吳相袁盎。

translations.literal: Wu Chu fan shu wen, bing wei fa, Dou Ying wei xing, yan gu Wu xiang Yuan Ang.
translations.idiomatic: Wu Chu rebellion letter heard, troops not yet sent, Dou Ying not yet gone, spoke former Wu chancellor Yuan Ang.

sentences.zh: 盎時家居，詔召入見。

translations.literal: Ang shi ju yu, zhao zhao ru jian.
translations.idiomatic: Ang at time home residence, decree summon enter see.

sentences.zh: 上方與晁錯調兵笇軍食，上問袁盎曰：「君嘗為吳相，知吳臣田祿伯為人乎？

translations.literal: Shang fang yu Cuo diao bing qian jun shi, shang wen Yuan Ang yue: "Jun chang wei Wu xiang, zhi Wu chen Tian Lu Bo wei ren hu?
translations.idiomatic: Emperor just with Cuo regulate troops prepare army provisions, emperor asked Yuan Ang: "You once Wu chancellor, know Wu minister Tian Lu Bo character?

sentences.zh: 今吳楚反，於公何如？」

translations.literal: Jin Wu Chu fan, yu gong he ru?"
translations.idiomatic: Now Wu Chu rebel, to you what like?"

sentences.zh: 對曰：「不足憂也，今破矣。」

translations.literal: Dui yue: "Bu zu you, jin po."
translations.idiomatic: Answered: "Not worth worry, now broken."

sentences.zh: 上曰：「吳王即山鑄錢，煮海水為鹽，誘天下豪桀，白頭舉事。

translations.literal: Shang yue: "Wu wang ji shan zhu qian, zhu hai shui wei yan, you tian xia hao jie, bai tou ju shi.
translations.idiomatic: Emperor said: "Wu king then mountain cast coins, boil seawater salt, lure realm heroic outstanding, white haired raise affair.

sentences.zh: 若此，其計不百全，豈發乎？

translations.literal: Ruo ci, qi ji not bai quan, qi fa hu?
translations.idiomatic: Like this, his plan not hundred complete, how arise?

sentences.zh: 何以言其無能為也？」

translations.literal: He yi yan qi wu neng wei?"
translations.idiomatic: How speak his unable do?"

sentences.zh: 袁盎對曰：「吳有銅鹽利則有之，安得豪桀而誘之！

translations.literal: Yuan Ang dui yue: "Wu you tong yan li then have it, an de hao jie er you it!
translations.idiomatic: Yuan Ang answered: "Wu has copper salt profit then has it, how obtain heroic outstanding lure them!

sentences.zh: 誠令吳得豪桀，亦且輔王為義，不反矣。

translations.literal: Cheng ling Wu de hao jie, yi qie fu wang wei yi, not fan.
translations.idiomatic: Truly if Wu obtained heroic outstanding, moreover would assist king for righteousness, not rebel.

sentences.zh: 吳所誘皆無賴子弟，亡命鑄錢姦人，故相率以反。」

translations.literal: Wu suo you jie jie wu lai zi di, wang ming zhu qian jian ren, gu xiang shuai yi fan."
translations.idiomatic: Wu lured all are rascals sons, fugitives cast coins evil people, therefore mutually lead to rebel."

sentences.zh: 晁錯曰：「袁盎策之善。」

translations.literal: Cuo yue: "Yuan Ang ce zhi shan."
translations.idiomatic: Cuo said: "Yuan Ang strategy good."

sentences.zh: 上問曰：「計安出？」

translations.literal: Shang wen yue: "Ji an chu?"
translations.idiomatic: Emperor asked: "Plan how come out?"

sentences.zh: 盎對曰：「願屏左右。」

translations.literal: Ang dui yue: "Yuan ping zuo you."
translations.idiomatic: Ang answered: "Wish screen left right."

sentences.zh: 上屏人，獨錯在。

translations.literal: Shang ping ren, du Cuo zai.
translations.idiomatic: Emperor screened people, only Cuo there.

sentences.zh: 盎曰：「臣所言，人臣不得知也。」

translations.literal: Ang yue: "Chen suo yan, ren chen bu de zhi."
translations.idiomatic: Ang said: "What I say, subject ministers cannot know."

sentences.zh: 乃屏錯。

translations.literal: Nai ping Cuo.
translations.idiomatic: Then screened Cuo.

sentences.zh: 錯趨避東廂，恨甚。

translations.literal: Cuo qu bi dong xiang, hen shen.
translations.idiomatic: Cuo hurried avoided east wing, hated greatly.

sentences.zh: 上卒問盎，盎對曰：「吳楚相遺書，曰『高帝王子弟各有分地，今賊臣晁錯擅適過諸侯，削奪之地』。

translations.literal: Shang zu wen Ang, Ang dui yue: "Wu Chu xiang yi shu, yue "Gao Di wang zi di ge you fen di, jin zei chen Cuo shan shi guo zhu hou, xue duo zhi di".
translations.idiomatic: Emperor finally asked Ang, Ang answered: "Wu Chu mutually sent letters, said 'Gao Di king sons each have divided lands, now traitor minister Cuo arbitrarily passes over feudal lords, reduce seize their lands.'

sentences.zh: 故以反為名，西共誅晁錯，復故地而罷。

translations.literal: Gu yi fan wei ming, xi gong zhu Cuo, fu gu di er ba.
translations.idiomatic: Therefore with rebellion as name, west together execute Cuo, restore old lands then stop.

sentences.zh: 方今計獨斬晁錯，發使赦吳楚七國，復其故削地，則兵可無血刃而俱罷。」

translations.literal: Fang jin ji du zhan Cuo, fa shi she Wu Chu qi guo, fu qi gu xue di, then bing ke wu xue ren er ju ba."
translations.idiomatic: Currently plan only behead Cuo, send envoys pardon Wu Chu seven kingdoms, restore their previously reduced lands, then troops can without bloodshed all stop."

sentences.zh: 於是上嘿然良久，曰：「顧誠何如，吾不愛一人以謝天下。」

translations.literal: Yu shi shang mo ran liang jiu, yue: "Gu cheng he ru, wu bu ai yi ren yi xie tian xia."
translations.idiomatic: Thereupon emperor silent long time, said: "Indeed how, I not love one person to apologize realm."

sentences.zh: 盎曰：「臣愚計無出此，願上孰計之。」

translations.literal: Ang yue: "Chen yu ji wu chu ci, yuan shang shu ji it."
translations.idiomatic: Ang said: "My foolish plan no exceed this, wish emperor carefully consider it."

sentences.zh: 乃拜盎為太常，吳王弟子德侯為宗正。

translations.literal: Nai bai Ang wei tai chang, Wu wang di zi De hou wei zong zheng.
translations.idiomatic: Then appointed Ang as grand master of ceremonies, Wu king younger son De marquis as director of ancestral temple.

sentences.zh: 盎裝治行。
後十餘日，上使中尉召錯，紿載行東市。
錯衣朝衣斬東市。
則遣袁盎奉宗廟，宗正輔親戚，使告吳如盎策。
至吳，吳楚兵已攻梁壁矣。
宗正以親故，先入見，諭吳王使拜受詔。
吳王聞袁盎來，亦知其欲說己，笑而應曰：「我已為東帝，尚何誰拜？」
不肯見盎而留之軍中，欲劫使將。
盎不肯，使人圍守，且殺之，盎得夜出，步亡去，走梁軍，遂歸報。
條侯將乘六乘傳，會兵滎陽。
至雒陽，見劇孟，喜曰：「七國反，吾乘傳至此，不自意全。
又以為諸侯已得劇孟，劇孟今無動。
吾據滎陽，以東無足憂者。」
至淮陽，問父絳侯故客鄧都尉曰：「策安出？」
客曰：「吳兵銳甚，難與爭鋒。
楚兵輕，不能久。
方今為將軍計，莫若引兵東北壁昌邑，以梁委吳，吳必盡銳攻之。
將軍深溝高壘，使輕兵絕淮泗口，塞吳馕道。
彼吳梁相敝而糧食竭，乃以全彊制其罷極，破吳必矣。」
條侯曰：「善。」
從其策，遂堅壁昌邑南，輕兵絕吳馕道。
吳王之初發也，吳臣田祿伯為大將軍。
田祿伯曰：「兵屯聚而西，無佗奇道，難以就功。
臣願得五萬人，別循江淮而上，收淮南、長沙，入武關，與大王會，此亦一奇也。」
吳王太子諫曰：「王以反為名，此兵難以藉人，藉人亦且反王，柰何？
且擅兵而別，多佗利害，未可知也，徒自損耳。」
吳王即不許田祿伯。
吳少將桓將軍說王曰：「吳多步兵，步兵利險；
漢多車騎，車騎利平地。
願大王所過城邑不下，直棄去，疾西據雒陽武庫，食敖倉粟，阻山河之險以令諸侯，雖毋入關，天下固已定矣。
即大王徐行，留下城邑，漢軍車騎至，馳入梁楚之郊，事敗矣。」
吳王問諸老將，老將曰：「此少年推鋒之計可耳，安知大慮乎！」
於是王不用桓將軍計。
吳王專并將其兵，未度淮，諸賓客皆得為將、校尉、候、司馬，獨周丘不得用。
周丘者，下邳人，亡命吳，酤酒無行，吳王濞薄之，弗任。
周丘上謁，說王曰：「臣以無能，不得待罪行閒。
臣非敢求有所將，願得王一漢節，必有以報王。」
王乃予之。
周丘得節，夜馳入下邳。
下邳時聞吳反，皆城守。
至傳舍，召令。
令入戶，使從者以罪斬令。
遂召昆弟所善豪吏告曰：「吳反兵且至，至，屠下邳不過食頃。
今先下，家室必完，能者封侯矣。」
出乃相告，下邳皆下。
周丘一夜得三萬人，使人報吳王，遂將其兵北略城邑。
比至城陽，兵十餘萬，破城陽中尉軍。
聞吳王敗走，自度無與共成功，即引兵歸下邳。
未至，疽發背死。
二月中，吳王兵既破，敗走，於是天子制詔將軍曰：「蓋聞為善者天報之以福；
為非者天報之以殃。
高皇帝親表功德，建立諸侯，幽王、悼惠王絕無後，孝文皇帝哀憐加惠，王幽王子遂、悼惠王子卬等，令奉其先王宗廟，為漢藩國，德配天地，明并日月。
吳王濞倍德反義，誘受天下亡命罪人，亂天下幣，稱病不朝二十餘年，有司數請濞罪，孝文皇帝寬之，欲其改行為善。
今乃與楚王戊、趙王遂、膠西王卬、濟南王辟光、菑川王賢、膠東王雄渠約從反，為逆無道，起兵以危宗廟，賊殺大臣及漢使者，迫劫萬民，夭殺無罪，燒殘民家，掘其丘冢，甚為暴虐。
今卬等又重逆無道，燒宗廟，鹵御物，朕甚痛之。
朕素服避正殿，將軍其勸士大夫擊反虜。
擊反虜者，深入多殺為功，斬首捕虜比三百石以上者皆殺之，無有所置。
敢有議詔及不如詔者，皆要斬。」
初，吳王之度淮，與楚王遂西敗棘壁，乘勝前，銳甚。
梁孝王恐，遣六將軍擊吳，又敗梁兩將，士卒皆還走梁。
梁數使使報條侯求救，條侯不許。
又使使惡條侯於上，上使人告條侯救梁，復守便宜不行。
梁使韓安國及楚死事相弟張羽為將軍，乃得頗敗吳兵。
吳兵欲西，梁城守堅，不敢西，即走條侯軍，會下邑。
欲戰，條侯壁，不肯戰。
吳糧絕，卒饑，數挑戰，遂夜奔條侯壁，驚東南。
條侯使備西北，果從西北入。
吳大敗，士卒多饑死，乃畔散。
於是吳王乃與其麾下壯士數千人夜亡去，度江走丹徒，保東越。
東越兵可萬餘人，乃使人收聚亡卒。
漢使人以利啗東越，東越即紿吳王，吳王出勞軍，即使人鏦殺吳王，盛其頭，馳傳以聞。
吳王子子華、子駒亡走閩越。
吳王之棄其軍亡也，軍遂潰，往往稍降太尉、梁軍。
楚王戊軍敗，自殺。
三王之圍齊臨菑也，三月不能下。
漢兵至，膠西、膠東、菑川王各引兵歸。
膠西王乃袒跣，席槁，飲水，謝太后。
王太子德曰：「漢兵遠，臣觀之已罷，可襲，願收大王餘兵擊之，擊之不勝，乃逃入海，未晚也。」
王曰：「吾士卒皆已壞，不可發用。」
弗聽。
漢將弓高侯穨當遺王書曰：「奉詔誅不義，降者赦其罪，復故；
不降者滅之。
王何處，須以從事。」
王肉袒叩頭漢軍壁，謁曰：「臣卬奉法不謹，驚駭百姓，乃苦將軍遠道至于窮國，敢請菹醢之罪。」
弓高侯執金鼓見之，曰：「王苦軍事，願聞王發兵狀。」
王頓首膝行對曰：「今者，晁錯天子用事臣，變更高皇帝法令，侵奪諸侯地。
卬等以為不義，恐其敗亂天下，七國發兵，且以誅錯。
今聞錯已誅，卬等謹以罷兵歸。」
將軍曰：「王茍以錯不善，何不以聞？
（及）［乃］未有詔虎符，擅發兵擊義國。
以此觀之，意非欲誅錯也。」
乃出詔書為王讀之。
讀之訖，曰：「王其自圖。」
王曰：「如卬等死有餘罪。」
遂自殺。
太后、太子皆死。
膠東、菑川、濟南王皆死，國除，納于漢。
酈將軍圍趙十月而下之，趙王自殺。
濟北王以劫故，得不誅，徙王菑川。
初，吳王首反，并將楚兵，連齊趙。
正月起兵，三月皆破，獨趙後下。
復置元王少子平陸侯禮為楚王，續元王後。
徙汝南王非王吳故地，為江都王。
太史公曰：吳王之王，由父省也。
能薄賦斂，使其眾，以擅山海利。
逆亂之萌，自其子興。
爭技發難，卒亡其本；
親越謀宗，竟以夷隕。
晁錯為國遠慮，禍反近身。
袁盎權說，初寵後辱。
故古者諸侯地不過百里，山海不以封。
「毋親夷狄，以疏其屬」，蓋謂吳邪？
「毋為權首，反受其咎」，豈盎、錯邪？
